channel.title: Please help me
channel.description:
Okay, what i need help with is Adding the new method of withdrawing money (like type in 14m) I want to add these:
-Withdraw mode including "m" for a million, "k" for a thousand. - Prevent the changepassword command from saving passes with capitals in it. - Censor for websites. So .com turns into .***
I'd Like to fix the following:
-Market clan chat glitch. (will automatically put you in without you wanting to)
-Food/Potion Glitch - Sometimes you cannot eat or drink. 1
-Prayer Glitch. (protect item doesn't work if you have it on and then log off, it will say it's on but doesn't work)
Can you please help me or tell me what to do?

item.title: Please help me
item.dc:creator: @3p1c_sk1ll3r 3p1c sk1ll3r
item.description:
@3p1c_sk1ll3r wrote:

Okay, what i need help with is Adding the new method of withdrawing money (like type in 14m)
I want to add these:

-Withdraw mode including “m” for a million, “k” for a thousand.

  • Prevent the changepassword command from saving passes with capitals in it.
  • Censor for websites. So .com turns into .***

I’d Like to fix the following:

-Market clan chat glitch. (will automatically put you in without you wanting to)

-Food/Potion Glitch - Sometimes you cannot eat or drink. 1

-Prayer Glitch. (protect item doesn’t work if you have it on and then log off, it will say it’s on but doesn’t work)

Can you please help me or tell me what to do?

Read full topic
